item.title: 特朗普家族的加密货币促销活动比比特币更糟糕
item.description: 市场数据截至美国东部时间上午 06:03。根据供应商协议，市场数据可能会有所延迟。【原文：Market data as of 06:03 am EST. Market data may be delayed depending on provider agreements.】

item.title: YouTube 创作者为人工智能泔水找到了新消费者：婴儿
item.description:
随着年龄较小的儿童在该平台上花费的时间越来越多，人们越来越担心他们的大脑正在被人工智能生成的自称具有教育意义的视频所塑造。【原文：

As younger children spend more time on the platform, concern is growing that their brains are being shaped by AI-generated videos purporting to be educational.

】

item.title: 波士顿写字楼不景气加剧，吴市长推动提高税收
item.description: 波士顿的商业建筑价值有望在 2026 财年再下降 6%，这加深了这座城市两年来的下滑趋势，而这座城市对房地产税收的依赖程度几乎超过了美国其他主要城市。【原文：Commercial building values in Boston are on track to fall another 6% in fiscal 2026, deepening a two-year slide in a city that leans more heavily on real estate taxes than almost any other major US municipality.】

item.title: 人工智能风险带来损失，Salesforce 的股价已处于历史低位
item.description: Salesforce Inc. 的股价从未如此便宜过，但投资者仍不买账，因为人们越来越担心人工智能会侵蚀该公司的增长前景。【原文：Salesforce Inc. shares have never been cheaper, but investors still aren’t buying amid rising fears about artificial intelligence eroding the company’s growth prospects.】

item.title: 欧洲禁用杀虫剂正在毒害尼日利亚
item.description:
被欧盟禁止使用的化学品在非洲各地广泛存在，威胁着粮食和水的供应。【原文：

Chemicals barred by the EU are widely available across Africa, threatening food and water supplies.

】

item.title: 加纳通胀再次放缓，引发再次降息的赌注
item.description: 加纳的通货膨胀率连续第 11 个月下降，降至近七年来的最低水平，这为央行再次降息提供了空间。【原文：Ghana’s inflation rate declined for the 11th straight month to the lowest level in almost seven years, providing scope for the central bank to cut interest rates again.】

item.title: 市场 "小鱼 "有望提升收益 推动最新涨势
item.description: 分析师对美国公司盈利增长能力的乐观情绪正在蔓延，上至大型科技巨头，下至市场上的小公司，几乎所有的公司都是如此。【原文：Analyst optimism about Corporate America’s ability to grow earnings is spreading from Big Tech megacaps down to the market’s minnows and virtually everything in between.】

item.title: Toronto Home Prices Continue to Slide as Listings Stay Elevated
item.description: Toronto home prices resumed declines in November as slowing demand saw properties for sale continue to build up on the market.

item.title: UK Bond Tape Eyes June Launch as Legal Suspension Set to End
item.description: A legal challenge halting the UK’s efforts to consolidate all bond trading data looks set to be resolved, paving the way for the project to start next June.

item.title: Japan’s JFE Steel to Form $3.4 Billion Venture With JSW
item.description: Japan’s JFE Steel Corp. will invest 157.5 billion rupees ($1.7 billion) in an an equal joint venture with India’s JSW Steel, the Japanese company said in a statement.

item.title: Cosmo Shares Soar Most in 17 Years on Hair-Loss Treatment Data
item.description: Cosmo Pharmaceuticals NV shares soared the most in 17 years after the company said its experimental treatment for male hair loss showed breakthrough results in two late-stage studies.

item.title: 中国唯一铀矿开采商在深圳上市，股价上涨三倍
item.description: 周三，中国唯一一家铀矿公司在深圳交易所上市，募集资金约 40 亿元人民币（5.7 亿美元），股价上涨两倍多。【原文：China’s only uranium miner raised around 4 billion yuan ($570 million) as it debuted on the Shenzhen exchange on Wednesday, with its shares more than tripling in value.】

item.title: 法国商业活动一年多来首次增长
item.description: 得益于服务业的强劲增长，法国私营部门在一年多的时间里首次实现增长，打破了最初关于私营部门停滞不前的评估。【原文：France’s private sector grew for the first time in more than a year thanks to strength in the services industry, defying an initial assessment that it stagnated.】

item.title: 现代汽车四轮平台机器人明年上市
item.description: 现代汽车集团将于明年开始销售一种由人工智能驱动的四轮机器人，这家韩国汽车制造商正在加大对先进移动技术的投入。【原文：Hyundai Motor Group will start selling a four-wheeled robot powered by artificial intelligence next year as the South Korean carmaker ramps up its push into advanced mobility.】

item.title: 恒力集团称 2026 年中前中国石油需求将持续低迷
item.description: 恒力石化国际私人有限公司（Hengli Petrochemical International Pte.【原文：Chinese oil demand is likely to remain subdued until at least the middle of next year, according to Janet Kong, chief executive officer of Hengli Petrochemical International Pte.】

item.title: 供应担忧支撑金属反弹，铜重拾涨势
item.description: 铜的交易价格离本周早些时候创下的历史新高不远，因为全球供应担忧支撑着投资者对这种对绿色转型至关重要的金属的偏好。【原文：Copper traded not far from its record high of earlier this week as global supply concerns underpinned investor appetite for the metal that’s critical to the green transition.】

item.title: 史密斯以 20 亿英镑的价值将机场扫描仪部门出售给 CVC
item.description: 史密斯集团（Smiths Group Plc）同意将其生产机场安全扫描仪的部门出售给私募股权公司 CVC Capital Partners，企业估值为 20 亿英镑（27 亿美元）。【原文：Smiths Group Plc agreed to sell its unit that makes airport security scanners to private equity firm CVC Capital Partners at an enterprise valuation of £2 billion ($2.7 billion).】

item.title: 日本央行关注工资上涨趋势，日本金属工会力争工资涨幅创历史新高
item.description: 日本一个工会组织将在年度谈判中推动加薪，加薪幅度将超过上一轮谈判中创纪录的加薪幅度，这是薪资增长势头得以保持的最新迹象。【原文：A Japanese labor union group will push in annual negotiations for a salary hike that exceeds the record gain obtained in the previous round of talks, in the latest sign that pay momentum is holding up.】

item.title: 埃及商业指数在英镑走强后创下五年新高
item.description: 埃及一项衡量商业活动的重要指标自 2 月份以来首次出现扩张，原因是需求增加和当地货币走强帮助提振了依赖进口的经济。【原文：A key gauge of business activity in Egypt expanded for the first time since February, as greater demand and a stronger local currency helped boost the import-reliant economy.】

item.title: 中国铜冶炼厂与智利矿商就费用谈判陷入僵局
item.description: 中国的铜冶炼企业面临着将矿石转化为金属的负收费前景，他们与智利的一家大型矿商在为该行业设定重要基准的谈判中陷入僵局。【原文：Chinese copper smelters, faced with the prospect of negative fees for turning ore into metal, are in stalemate with a major Chilean miner in talks to set a crucial benchmark for the industry.】

item.title: 中国困境加剧，万达面临 7 亿美元债券的最后期限
item.description: 随着离岸债券到期日的日益临近，中国日益恶化的房地产债务危机正在加大对迄今为止避免了违约的中国大型房地产公司的审查力度。【原文：China’s worsening property debt crisis is ratcheting up scrutiny of the country’s major real estate firms that have so far avoided default, as looming offshore bond maturities draw closer.】

item.title: 瑞士通胀率意外降至零，瑞士央行遭遇挫折
item.description: 瑞士 11 月通胀意外停滞，一项基本指标放缓至四年低点，这对央行官员来说是一个挫折，而此时距离他们做出 2025 年最后一次利率决定只有几天时间了。【原文：Swiss inflation unexpectedly stalled in November and an underlying measure slowed to a four-year low, a setback for central bank officials just days before their final interest-rate decision of 2025.】

item.title: 泰晤士河水务公司债务不断增加，重组谈判遥遥无期
item.description: 泰晤士水务公司（Thames Water）报告称，由于谈判仍在继续，试图就债权人主导的救援协议达成一致，该公司的债务不断膨胀。【原文：Thames Water reported a ballooning debt pile as negotiations continue to try to agree on a creditor-led rescue deal.】

item.title: 土耳其通胀意外放缓为大幅降息铺平道路
item.description: 土耳其 11 月份通胀降温幅度超过预期，为央行下周实施更大幅度的降息扫清了道路。【原文：Turkish inflation cooled more than expected in November, clearing a path for the central bank to deliver a more sizable interest-rate cut next week.】

item.title: 英镑上涨，英国富时 100 指数期货持稳
比特币创两周新高，但加密货币情绪依然脆弱
item.description: 比特币周三延续了试探性反弹，创下两周新高，整个加密货币市场正在寻求从长达数周的大跌中持续复苏。【原文：Bitcoin extended a tentative rebound on Wednesday, hitting a two-week high as the wider crypto market seeks a sustained recovery from a weeks-long selloff.】

item.title: 中国初创公司的可重复使用火箭发射后坠毁
item.description: 据中国国家媒体报道，中国一枚部分可重复使用的火箭在发射后坠毁，这表明中国在追逐埃隆-马斯克的 SpaceX 公司所掌握的技术时所面临的挑战。【原文：A partially reusable Chinese rocket crash-landed after launch, according to state media, illustrating the challenges the country faces as it chases the technology mastered by Elon Musk’s SpaceX.】

item.title: 中国在获得新进口配额后扩大伊朗石油进口量
item.description: 在中国政府于上月底发布新一轮进口配额之后，中国的独立炼油企业正在增加从陆上油罐和海上闲置船只中进口伊朗原油的数量。【原文：China’s independent oil refiners are boosting their intake of Iranian crude from onshore tanks and ships idling at sea after Beijing issued a fresh round of import quotas late last month.】

item.title: 万科多名债券持有人表示将反对延期计划
item.description: 熟悉内情的人士称，至少有三家本月到期的中国万科公司债券的投资者已向这家陷入困境的开发商发出信号，他们将反对推迟还款的计划。【原文：At least three investors in a China Vanke Co. bond maturing this month have signaled to the embattled developer that they will oppose a plan to delay repayment, people familiar with the matter said.】

item.title: 野村因估值和增长政策上调印尼股票评级
item.description: 野村控股公司将其对印尼股票的建议上调至增持，理由是估值具有吸引力，而且印尼国内政策支持经济增长。【原文：Nomura Holdings Inc. has raised its recommendation on Indonesian stocks to overweight, citing attractive valuations and a domestic policy that’s supportive of growth.】
